name: Moonshot Strategies
goal: Moonshot Strategies is an advisory firm working with technology companies and venture capital firms, advising leaders and investors on devising public policy and communications strategies, structures and teams to ensure their innovation succeeds, no matter how challenging the environment.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: Technology-related issues primarliy: data flow, data protection, digital content, telecommunications, consumer protection, copyright, etc.
